meanings.definition: The state or quality of being growly.
meanings.sent1: Her growlinesses were evident when she refused to speak to anyone.
meanings.sent2: The dog's growlinesses were a sign that it was not in a good mood.
meanings.sent3: Despite his growlinesses, he still managed to crack a smile.
meanings.sent4: The growlinesses in the room were so thick, you could almost feel them.
meanings.sent5: The growlinesses of the bear made everyone back away slowly.

meanings.definition: The act of growling or showing aggression.
meanings.sent1: The growlinesses of the lion scared away all the other animals.
meanings.sent2: His growlinesses were a warning to stay away.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy's growlinesses were more cute than intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The growlinesses of the storm could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The growlinesses of the wrestler made his opponent think twice.

meanings.definition: A feeling of irritability or surliness.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't hide her growlinesses, no matter how hard she tried.
meanings.sent2: His growlinesses were a result of a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The growlinesses in the air were palpable as the meeting dragged on.
meanings.sent4: The growlinesses in his voice made it clear he was not in the mood for jokes.
meanings.sent5: The growlinesses in her expression warned others to approach with caution.
